body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, printer. New York native. Married to Mary Civill. Father of Frank A. Civill, Lewis A. Civill, and Maggie Civill. Book binder and printer at L. A. Civill & Wood in partnership with Logan A. Wood in Louisville in 1861.
